branchCategory.name: 90-VP300/500, 3 Port Solenoid Valve, Body Ported, Single Unit
branchCategory.description: SMC's&nbsp;VP300/500 series solenoid valve, offers high flow capacity and&nbsp;reduced power consumption (1.55W standard, 0.55W with power saving circuit).&nbsp; The VP series may be&nbsp;used as either a&nbsp;selector valve, or a divider valve.&nbsp; It&nbsp;is&nbsp;available in a normally closed&nbsp;or a normally open style.
